bug.author: guglielmocamporese
bug.description:
Line 194 is missing the square bracket:
wrong Use distribution to create a linear combination of value with shape batch_size, Tq, dim]:
correct Use distribution to create a linear combination of value with shape [batch_size, Tq, dim]:
Link to the line code: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r2.0/tensorflow/python/keras/layers/dense_attention.py#L194>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r2.0/tensorflow/python/keras/layers/dense_attention.py#L194</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/guglielmocamporese>@guglielmocamporese</denchmark-link> Are you willing to open a PR to fix the doc?
